title: FM discusses French support in expansion of SL economy
content: Foreign Minister Prof. G.L Peiris met with France's Minister Delegate for Trade and Economic Attractiveness Franck Reister to discuss French support for the expansion of economic relations with Sri Lanka in a variety of sectors.The meeting took place at the Foreign Ministry in Paris, where a Memorandum of Understanding was signed at the conclusion of their discussion.The Foreign Minister also attended several meetings at the Chamber of Commerce of France. He met with Counsellor Bernard Quinet and Head of International Business Networks Estelle Gillot for talks on  networking arrangements between French and Sri Lankan companies and obtaining French expertise for educational programmes in entrepreneurship, business management and related subjects.Minister Peiris also held discussions with Francois Corbin of MEDEF International, the largest association of companies in France. Among  other representatives of the corporate sector he met in Paris were Secretary General of the company M21 Life Sciences Christian Leroux and Vice President of Marketing Strategy Thales DIS Jean-Claude Perrin.
